name: Kia EV6
description: The price of Kia EV6, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 60.97  - 65.97 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. EV6 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 8 airbags. Kia EV6 has a ground clearance of 178 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 708 Km for EV6.

variants.variant_name: EV6 GT Line 77.4 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 708 Km
EV6 GT Line AWD 77.4 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 708 Km
